humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the malignant phyllodes tumor in the left breast, which is 25 x 17 x 16.5 cm. Based on the rules provided, T3 tumors are more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage of cancer is determined by the size of the tumor and whether it has invaded the surrounding tissue. In this report, the tumor size is described as 'a 25 x 17 x 16.5 CM mass' in the left breast. According to the TNM staging system for cancer, a T3 stage is defined as a tumor that is larger than 5 cm in greatest dimension. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T3.
